com.keyboardr.glassremote.server

Class MessageService<S,R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • Service
      • com.keyboardr.glassremote.server.MessageService<S,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - type of messages to send to the remote client
    R - type of messages to receive from the remote client
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StringMessageService

    public abstract class MessageService<S,R>
extends Service
    Sends and receives messages with a remote client. This service must be running in order for a remote client to connect.
    Author:
    Joshua Brown

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected MessageService(String name, UUID uuid, MessageSender<S> sender, MessageReceiver<R> receiver)
      Class constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected boolean isConnected()
      Checks if this MessageService is connected to a client
      IBinder onBind(Intent intent) 
      protected abstract void onConnected(BluetoothDevice remoteDevice)
      A remote client has connected to this service and is able to send and receive messages
      void onCreate() 
      void onDestroy() 
      protected abstract void onDisconnected(BluetoothDevice remoteDevice)
      A remote client has disconnected from this service and is no longer able to send and receive messages
      protected abstract void onReceiveMessage(R message)
      This MessageService has received a message from the remote client
      protected void sendMessage(S message)
      Sends a S message to the remote client.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MessageService

        protected MessageService(String name,
              UUID uuid,
              MessageSender<S> sender,
              MessageReceiver<R> receiver)
        Class constructor. Concrete implementations must have a zero-argument constructor.
        Parameters:
        name - service name for SDP record
        uuid - a UUID shared between the remote client and this server. UUIDs can be obtained at http ://www.uuidgenerator.net/ and instantiated using UUID.fromString(String).
        sender - the MessageSender providing the implementation for sending S messages
        receiver - the MessageReceiver providing the implementation for receiving R messages

    • Method Detail

      • onBind

        public IBinder onBind(Intent intent)

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate()

      • onDestroy

        public void onDestroy()

      • onConnected

        protected abstract void onConnected(BluetoothDevice remoteDevice)
        A remote client has connected to this service and is able to send and receive messages
        Parameters:
        remoteDevice - the BluetoothDevice this MessageService has connected to

      • onDisconnected

        protected abstract void onDisconnected(BluetoothDevice remoteDevice)
        A remote client has disconnected from this service and is no longer able to send and receive messages
        Parameters:
        remoteDevice - the BluetoothDevice this MessageService has disconnected from

      • onReceiveMessage

        protected abstract void onReceiveMessage(R message)
        This MessageService has received a message from the remote client
        Parameters:
        message - the M message received from the remote client

      • isConnected

        protected boolean isConnected()
        Checks if this MessageService is connected to a client
        Returns:
        true iff this MessageService can send and receive messages from a remote client

      • sendMessage

        protected void sendMessage(S message)
        Sends a S message to the remote client. May be called from the main thread
        Parameters:
        message - the S message to send
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the MessageService is not connected
